item.title: Blog about Python
item.description: #go to add-ins. insert image. put browse. see if it works on the viewer.make sure to save it. It should work #this is a python code chunk print("hello world!") ## hello world! x="dog" library(reticulate) #install package reticulate #this is an R code chunk py$x ## [1] "dog" y<-2 r.y+1==3 ## True it canâ€™t be this exact example but it might work do I need to put an image here in blog post?
